ui.locale: A heading for the locale setting.
ui.select-language: Label for a language select field

session.authenticate: A heading of a modal that prompts the user to authenticate
session.authenticate-explanation: Text displayed above a list of possible authentication methods
session.logging-in: Displayed while the authentication process is running.
session.offline: Displayed in the header as an indicator that there's currently no internet connection

editor.select-editor: A label for a select field, allowing the user to choose from available editors
editor.choose-editor: A heading for a model prompting the user to pick an editor
editor.choose-editor-explanation: Text displayed above a list of options for choosing an editor. {type} is a MIME type
editor.not-found: Bold, heading-like text in an error message
editor.load-error: Bold, heading-like text in an error message

settings.settings: Used as a menu item and panel heading
settings.document-settings: Label for this document's settings (for everyone viewing it)
settings.personal-document-settings: Label for this user's personal settings for this document.

oauth.authorization-explanation: Displayed above a list of functionality. {app_url} is the web address of the other app.
oauth.scope-all: Displayed if the other app wants access to all of the user's account
oauth.warning: Bold, heading-like text in a warning message
oauth.redirecting: Displayed while the user's browser is being redirected
